goals__remit: Arion Holding B.V. is the parent company for a range of subsidiaries that produce and sell products for the healthcare sector. Arion Holding B.V. has two main product ranges. One product range covers application aids for compression stockings, the other product range covers single-use, prepackaged wet wipes for carrying out bedbaths.
